mapper.select: SELECT sum(b.bill_entry_amount) AS sumAmount, count(b.roominfo_id) AS countNum, b.payType FROM billAccount b WHERE b.housing_id = #{housingId} AND date_format(b.payDate, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND b.payStatus = true GROUP BY b.payType;

SELECT sum(b.bill_entry_amount) AS sumAmount, b.payType FROM billaccount b join housinginfo h on b.housing_id = h.id WHERE h.parent_id = #{propertyId} AND date_format(b.payDate, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND b.payStatus = true GROUP BY b.payType;

SELECT sum(b.bill_entry_amount) AS sumAmount, b.cost_type FROM billAccount b WHERE b.housing_id = #{housingId} AND date_format(b.payDate, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND b.payStatus = true GROUP BY b.cost_type;

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN b.payStatus = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS unfkCount,SUM(CASE WHEN b.payStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fkCount, SUM(CASE WHEN b.payStatus = 0 THEN b.bill_entry_amount ELSE 0 END) AS unfkAmount,SUM(CASE WHEN b.payStatus = 1 THEN b.bill_entry_amount ELSE 0 END) AS fkAmount, SUM(CASE WHEN b.STATUS = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS untbCount,SUM(CASE WHEN b.STATUS = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tbCount FROM billaccount b JOIN housinginfo h ON b.housing_id = h.id
and b.deleteStatus = false and h.deleteStatus = false
AND b.housing_id = #{housingId}
and h.`code` like CONCAT(#{housingCode},'%')
